Posts.Content: Nine days post opp, just had cath removed yesterday. Glad to be rid of that ball and chain . Now on to the next battle of trying to be continent . Doc removed prostate some lymp nodes said all went well but still advises radiation in 6 months
Posts.Title: Surgery behind me now
